attributes.action: A Vote Of NO Confidence in the UK Conservative Party
attributes.background: Based on recent policies this party may be in breech of democracy.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about party politics. If you want a vote of no confidence in the current UK Government then you could start a petition asking for Parliament to hold a no confidence vote on the Government. You may find that we already have a petition open that you agree with, such as this one:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/125332
